ai.sharingNotSupported: Sharing is not supported on this device/browser.
ai.filesNotSupported: System does not support sharing files.

app.eventWizardSubtitle: Use the AI Assistant to identify the event and extract technical parameters.
app.noAnalysisDescription: Start a new event analysis from the Dashboard to see the Agent Pipeline in action.
app.noRCADescription: Complete an event analysis to generate an RCA report.
app.settingsComingSoon: Settings module coming soon in v3.1
app.selectModule: Select a module from the sidebar
app.wellRequiredDescription: This section requires an active well. Select a well to access event analysis and well-specific data.

well.selectWellDescription: Select an existing well project or create a new one to start analysis.
well.noWellsYet: No wells registered yet. Click "New Well Project" to start.
well.deleteWellMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this well project? This action cannot be undone and all associated data will be lost.
well.deleteError: Failed to delete well. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Engineering Dashboard
dashboard.moduleDescTD: Real-time axial force analysis, hookload prediction, and buckling assessment
dashboard.moduleDescHyd: Pressure loss distribution, ECD profiling, bit optimization, and surge/swab analysis
dashboard.moduleDescSP: Mechanism diagnosis, risk matrix assessment, free point estimation
dashboard.moduleDescWC: Kill sheet calculations, pressure schedules, volumetric & bullhead methods
dashboard.moduleDescCU: Hole cleaning analysis, cuttings transport, annular velocity, sweep pill design
dashboard.moduleDescPF: Tubing-packer force analysis, buckling assessment, thermal & pressure effects
dashboard.moduleDescWH: CT pressure losses, snubbing forces, weight/drag analysis, max reach estimation
dashboard.moduleDescSC: PSD analysis, gravel pack design, screen selection, sanding risk assessment
dashboard.moduleDescDDR: Daily drilling reports, completion reports, termination reports, KPI tracking & operations log
dashboard.moduleDescCD: Interval design, skin factor analysis, perforation optimization, flow efficiency
dashboard.moduleDescSE: Karakas-Tariq skin model, perforation geometry, flow efficiency analysis
dashboard.moduleDescVB: BHA vibration analysis, critical RPM, lateral & torsional modes
dashboard.moduleDescCem: Slurry design, displacement mechanics, centralization, job simulation
dashboard.moduleDescCsg: Load cases, burst/collapse/tension design, safety factors, grade selection
dashboard.moduleDescPetro: LAS import, Waxman-Smits & Dual-Water Sw, Pickett plot, crossplots, net pay
dashboard.moduleDescRTM: WITSML 1.4.1 data ingestion, real-time KPI gauges, drilling parameter charts, alarm system

ddr.title: Daily Reports / DDR
ddr.subtitle: Daily Mobilization, Drilling, Completion & Termination Reports
ddr.noReportsDesc: Create a new daily report to get started.
ddr.noKPIData: No KPI data available. Create reports to see analytics.
ddr.noReportsYet: No reports yet. Create a new DDR to get started.
ddr.selectWellDescription: Choose an existing well or create a new one to manage daily reports, KPIs, and AI analysis.
ddr.noReportsForAnalysis: Create at least one report to enable AI analysis.

torqueDrag.title: Torque & Drag Analysis
torqueDrag.uploadSurveyHint: Upload survey data in the Survey Input tab to view the well path.

compare.title: Multi-Operation Comparison
compare.description: Run all operations (Trip Out, Trip In, Rotating, Sliding) with the same well data and overlay the force profiles.

backCalc.title: Back-Calculate Friction Factor
backCalc.description: Compare predicted vs measured hookload to determine actual friction factor.

bit.runFirst: Run Full Hydraulics first to see bit optimization results.

diagnosis.title: Stuck Pipe Diagnostic Decision Tree
diagnosis.description: Answer a series of questions to identify the stuck pipe mechanism.
diagnosis.question: Question {{num}}

actions.title: Action Plan
actions.description: Recommended actions are prioritized by urgency category.
actions.runRiskFirst: Run Risk Assessment to populate specific actions for this mechanism.
actions.noMechanismDesc: Complete the Diagnosis Wizard or select a mechanism in the Risk Matrix tab to see recommended actions.

simulation.kickMigrationDesc: Simulate gas migration in shut-in well with Z-factor expansion
simulation.killCirculationDesc: Step-by-step kill simulation with DPP/CP tracking

prerecord.title: Pre-Record Kill Sheet Data
prerecord.description: Enter static well data before any kick occurs. This is your reference kill sheet.

schedule.title: Schedule Table
schedule.noScheduleDesc: Calculate kill sheet in "Active Kill" tab first.

volumetric.title: Volumetric Method
volumetric.description: No circulation needed — for stuck pipe or pump failure.

bullhead.title: Bullhead
bullhead.description: Force influx back — for H2S or off-bottom situations.

wellboreCleanup.title: Wellbore Cleanup
wellboreCleanup.subtitle: Hole Cleaning, CTR & Sweep Design
wellboreCleanup.noResults: No results. Go to "Parameters" and run the analysis.

packerForces.title: Packer Forces
packerForces.subtitle: Thermal / Pressure Analysis
packerForces.noResults: No results. Go to "Parameters" and run the calculation.

workoverHyd.title: Workover Hydraulics
workoverHyd.subtitle: CT Hydraulics, Forces & Reach
workoverHyd.noResults: No results. Go to "Parameters" and run the calculation.

sandControl.title: Sand Control
sandControl.subtitle: PSD, Saucier Gravel & Sanding Analysis
sandControl.noResults: No results. Go to "Parameters" and run the analysis.

completionDesign.title: Completion Design
completionDesign.subtitle: Perforation, Stimulation & Fracturing
completionDesign.noResults: No results. Go to "Parameters" and run the analysis.

shotEfficiency.title: Shot Efficiency
shotEfficiency.subtitle: Petrophysics & Interval Ranking
shotEfficiency.noResults: No results. Go to "Parameters" and run the analysis.

vibrations.title: Vibrations & Stability
vibrations.subtitle: Drillstring Dynamics & MSE
vibrations.noResults: No results. Go to "Parameters" and run the analysis.

cementing.title: Cementing Simulation
cementing.subtitle: Displacement, ECD, Free-Fall & U-Tube
cementing.noResults: No results. Go to "Parameters" and run the simulation.

casingDesign.title: Casing Design
casingDesign.subtitle: API 5C3 Burst/Collapse/Tension + VME
casingDesign.noResults: No results. Go to "Parameters" and run the design.

eventWizard.title: Event Analysis Wizard
eventWizard.maxSizeWarning: Total file size must not exceed 10 MB
eventWizard.uploadDDR: Upload DDR, logs, or technical reports
eventWizard.supportedFormats: PDF, CSV, TXT, MD — max 5 files
eventWizard.dataComplete: Data meets minimum requirements for analysis
eventWizard.selectAgents: Select AI agents to participate in the analysis.
eventWizard.requiresAtLeastOne: For "{{eventType}}" at least one is required
eventWizard.fillAtLeastOneStarred: For this event type, fill at least one of the fields marked with ★
eventWizard.addMoreDocs: Add more documents to enrich data

analysis.processingDescription: The AI model is processing operational data and previous findings. This may take a few seconds.
analysis.clickToExecute: Click the button to execute the automated analysis for this step.

rca.noRootCause: Could not identify a definitive root cause. Review the event data.

realtime.title: WITSML Real-Time Monitor
realtime.subtitle: Real-time drilling data via WITSML 1.4.1
realtime.noDataHint: Paste WITSML XML, connect to a server, or load demo data
realtime.alarmECDHigh: ECD {{value}} ppg exceeds limit of {{threshold}} ppg
realtime.alarmTorqueHigh: Torque {{value}} ft-lb exceeds limit of {{threshold}} ft-lb
